title: Northeast Stories: The Rising Era
overview: Ma Rulong, CEO of Jichun Group, was attacked and left with amnesia. After being taken in by Chen Hong, he became a laborer at her garment shop. He went through experiences like provoking local gangsters, accepting a deathbed guardianship pledge from Uncle Qin, and gradually regaining his memory while pawning his jade pendant. Amid internal strife at Jichun Group, this resurrected man forged a reborn conglomerate to dismantle rival Yongming Group.
